title: Merge pull request #11 from TDFKAOlli/fix_snd_recv_android_6

Merge pull request #11 from TDFKAOlli/fix_snd_recv_android_6

Fixed send and receive functionality for Android 6 and above.

title: Fixed send and receive functionality for Android 6 and above. Rights management…
message:
Fixed send and receive functionality for Android 6 and above. Rights management forbids file scheme sharing and instead we need to use content schemes. Filters adapted accordingly.
Additionally the application must request for external memory read/write rights, regardless of the manifest settings. Certain functionality (import, export, send, receive) is blocked as long as rights are not given.

title: Merge pull request #6 from TDFKAOlli/send-and-receive-config

Send and receive config

title: Added intent-filter to register this app for taking application/octet-stream.…
message: Added intent-filter to register this app for taking application/octet-stream. Moved now duplicate code section to method (importHostsFromUri).

title: Send hosts as file to other app.
message:
Send hosts as file to other app.
Creates a new file using the serializeHosts() function, as files are most reliable to be exchanged (especially on e-mail apps).

title: Merge pull request #5 from TDFKAOlli/multiple-widget-size
message:
Merge pull request #5 from TDFKAOlli/multiple-widget-size

Added support for multiple widget sizes (1x1, 2x1, 3x1 and 4x1).

title: Added support for multiple widget sizes (1x1, 2x1, 3x1 and 4x1).
message:
Added support for multiple widget sizes (1x1, 2x1, 3x1 and 4x1).
Fixed a few lint warnings in AndroidManifest (android:allowBackup) and layout/widget.xml (android:singleLine obsolete).
